name: Senior Software Engineer - Cloud Infrastructure
description:
Join Amazon's Cloud Infrastructure Team

Are you passionate about building scalable cloud solutions that serve millions of customers worldwide? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is looking for talented engineers to join our dynamic cloud infrastructure team.

What You'll Do:

  • Design and develop highly scalable distributed systems for AWS
  • Work with cutting-edge technologies including Kubernetes, Docker, and microservices
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative cloud solutions
  • Optimize performance and reliability of critical AWS services
  • Participate in on-call rotations to ensure 99.99% uptime

Why Amazon?

Join a company that's revolutionizing cloud computing and help build the infrastructure that powers the internet. You'll work alongside some of the brightest minds in technology and have access to unlimited learning opportunities.

"At Amazon, we're always Day 1. We're always looking to invent and simplify for our customers." - Jeff Bezos

name: iOS Developer - Consumer Applications
description:
Shape the Future of iOS at Apple

Join Apple's world-class iOS development team and create innovative applications that delight millions of users across the globe. Be part of the team that defines the future of mobile technology.

Your Mission:

  • Develop cutting-edge iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI
  • Design intuitive user interfaces that follow Apple's Human Interface Guidelines
  • Collaborate with designers, product managers, and fellow engineers
  • Optimize app performance for the latest iPhone and iPad devices
  • Implement accessibility features to make apps inclusive for all users

The Apple Difference:

At Apple, we believe that technology should be personal, beautiful, and accessible. You'll work on products that millions of people use every day, from the iPhone to the Apple Watch.

Benefits Include:

  • Stock purchase plans and equity opportunities
  • Comprehensive health and wellness programs
  • On-site fitness facilities and wellness centers
  • Product discounts on all Apple products

name: Machine Learning Engineer - Search
description:
Power Google Search with Machine Learning

Join Google's Search team and work on machine learning algorithms that help billions of users find relevant information quickly and accurately. Be at the forefront of AI and search technology innovation.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and optimize machine learning models for search ranking
  • Work with massive datasets using TensorFlow and PyTorch
  • Implement natural language processing algorithms for better query understanding
  • Collaborate with research teams to bring cutting-edge AI to production
  • Analyze search quality metrics and user behavior patterns

Impact at Scale:

Your work will directly impact 8.5 billion searches per day across Google's search ecosystem. You'll be solving some of the most challenging problems in information retrieval and machine learning.

What Makes This Role Special:

"We're not just building a search engine; we're organizing the world's information and making it universally accessible."

Technologies you'll work with: Python, C++, TensorFlow, BigQuery, Kubernetes

name: Frontend Developer - E-commerce Platform
description:
Build the Future of E-commerce in Southeast Asia

Join Lazada's frontend development team and create seamless shopping experiences for millions of customers across Southeast Asia. Help build the region's leading e-commerce platform.

What You'll Build:

  • Responsive and intuitive user interfaces using React.js and TypeScript
  • Mobile-first designs that work flawlessly on all devices
  • High-performance e-commerce features: product catalogs, shopping carts, checkout flows
  • Real-time features like live chat and notifications
  • A/B testing frameworks for optimizing user experience

The Lazada Experience:

Lazada is Southeast Asia's leading e-commerce ecosystem, serving over 155 million active consumers. You'll be part of a diverse, international team working in a fast-paced, innovative environment.

Tech Stack:

React.js • Redux • TypeScript • Webpack • Jest • Cypress

Growth Opportunities:

  • Work with teams across 6 countries in Southeast Asia
  • Learn from industry experts and attend tech conferences
  • Career progression in a rapidly growing company

name: Content Recommendation Engineer
description:
Personalize Entertainment for 230+ Million Members

Join Netflix's recommendation engine team and help members discover their next favorite show or movie. Build world-class personalization systems that serve billions of recommendations daily.

Your Impact:

  • Design and implement machine learning algorithms for content recommendation
  • Work with massive datasets using Spark, Kafka, and Cassandra
  • Develop real-time recommendation systems that adapt to user behavior
  • Optimize recommendation quality through A/B testing and experimentation
  • Collaborate with data scientists and product managers globally

The Netflix Culture:

"We're a team, not a family. We're like a pro sports team where everyone plays at the top of their game."

At Netflix, you'll enjoy unlimited vacation, competitive compensation, and the freedom to make impactful decisions.

Technical Challenges:

  • Processing 1+ billion hours of viewing data monthly
  • Serving recommendations in under 100ms globally
  • Supporting 190+ countries with localized content

Technologies: Python • Scala • Spark • TensorFlow • Kubernetes • AWS

name: UI/UX Designer - Creative Suite
description:
Design the Tools That Empower Creativity

Join Adobe's Creative Suite team and design intuitive, powerful user interfaces that shape the creative workflow for millions of designers, photographers, and content creators worldwide.

What You'll Create:

  • User interfaces for industry-leading applications like Photoshop, Illustrator, and XD
  • Innovative design systems that scale across multiple platforms
  • Accessibility-first designs that include all users
  • Prototypes and interactive mockups using Adobe XD and Figma
  • User research studies to validate design decisions

The Creative Challenge:

You'll be designing for creative professionals who depend on our tools to bring their visions to life. Every pixel matters, every interaction counts.

Design Impact:

  • 90% of creative professionals worldwide use Adobe tools
  • Your designs will be used by 26+ million Creative Cloud subscribers
  • Work on features seen by millions daily
"Creativity for all" - Adobe's mission drives everything we do

Tools you'll use: Adobe XD • Figma • Sketch • Principle • After Effects

name: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
Drive Brand Success Through Digital Innovation

Join our award-winning PR agency and lead digital marketing campaigns for Fortune 500 clients across various industries. Develop strategic initiatives that drive measurable brand awareness and engagement.

Campaign Leadership:

  • Manage integrated campaigns across social media, SEO, and paid advertising
  • Develop content strategies that resonate with target audiences
  • Analyze campaign performance using advanced analytics tools
  • Collaborate with creative teams to produce compelling brand content
  • Present campaign results and insights to C-level executives

Client Portfolio:

Work with industry-leading brands including tech startups, fashion retailers, and healthcare companies. Your campaigns will reach millions of consumers globally.

Growth Opportunities:

  • Lead client presentations and pitch new business
  • Attend industry conferences and networking events
  • Mentor junior team members and interns
  • Develop expertise in emerging marketing technologies

Platforms: Google Ads • Facebook Business • LinkedIn Campaign Manager • HubSpot • Salesforce

name: Backend Developer - Microservices
description:
Build Southeast Asia's Leading E-commerce Platform

Join Shopee's backend engineering team and develop scalable microservices that power millions of transactions daily across Southeast Asia's fastest-growing e-commerce platform.

Technical Excellence:

  • Design and implement high-performance backend services using Java and Spring Boot
  • Build microservices architecture that scales to millions of users
  • Optimize database performance for high-traffic e-commerce operations
  • Implement real-time features like live streaming and flash sales
  • Work with containerized deployments using Docker and Kubernetes

Scale & Impact:

Shopee processes 11.1 billion orders annually and serves over 343 million active buyers. Your code will directly impact the shopping experience for millions of users.

Technical Stack:

Java • Spring Boot • MySQL • Redis • Kafka • Kubernetes • Docker

The Shopee Experience:

  • Work in an agile, fast-paced environment
  • Collaborate with international teams across multiple countries
  • Learn from senior engineers with deep e-commerce expertise
  • Contribute to open-source projects and tech talks

name: Product Manager - Mobile Commerce
description:
Shape Vietnam's E-commerce Future

Join Tiki as a Product Manager and drive the product strategy for Vietnam's leading mobile commerce platform. Lead cross-functional teams to deliver innovative shopping experiences for millions of Vietnamese consumers.

Product Leadership:

  • Define product roadmaps for mobile-first e-commerce features
  • Conduct market research and competitive analysis in the Vietnamese market
  • Lead agile development teams including designers and engineers
  • Analyze user behavior and conversion metrics to drive product decisions
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to prioritize features and initiatives

Learning Opportunities:

As an intern, you'll work closely with senior product managers and gain hands-on experience in:

  • Product discovery and user research methodologies
  • Data analysis using SQL and analytics tools
  • A/B testing and experimentation frameworks
  • Agile methodologies and scrum practices

Tiki's Mission:

"Making happiness accessible to everyone" - We're building Vietnam's most customer-centric platform

Tools you'll learn: Jira • Confluence • Google Analytics • Mixpanel • Figma

name: Video Algorithm Engineer
description:
Power the World's Most Creative Video Platform

Join TikTok's video algorithm team and develop cutting-edge video processing algorithms that enhance video quality, compression, and real-time effects for over 1 billion users worldwide.

Technical Innovation:

  • Develop advanced video compression algorithms for optimal streaming quality
  • Implement real-time video effects and filters using computer vision
  • Optimize video processing pipelines for mobile and web platforms
  • Work with GPU programming (CUDA) for high-performance video processing
  • Research and implement emerging video technologies like AI-enhanced quality

Global Impact:

Your algorithms will process billions of videos uploaded daily, ensuring smooth playback and creative experiences for users across 150+ countries.

Technical Challenges:

  • Processing 1+ billion video uploads daily
  • Delivering content in under 200ms globally
  • Supporting 75+ languages and diverse content formats
  • Scaling infrastructure for peak traffic during viral moments

Innovation Culture:

"Inspire creativity and bring joy" - TikTok's mission drives our technical excellence

Technologies: C++ • Python • OpenCV • FFmpeg • CUDA • TensorFlow • Kubernetes
